headline: Bristol Myers upgraded to Buy at Jefferies on new launch momentum, pipeline
summary: As previously reported, Jefferies upgraded Bristol Myers (BMY) to Buy from Hold with a price target of $70, up from $63. The firm thinks Cobenfy can become a $10B-plus drug, is getting “increasingly more confident” that Milvexian could hit on non-inferiority and has gotten more visibility on profit-and-loss and thinks the thesis that the EPS floor will break $6 is “gone,” noting that it sees an EPS trough in 2029 or earlier with operating leverage. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source
